description:
Calql8 Time Zones HD is a world clock that lets you see the current and future time with Time Forecasting. 
Determine when you can set meetings, phone calls, and make travel arrangements across multiple time zones.
Calql8 Time Zones shines when you have more than 2 cities you need to view the current or future time in.
Move time forward or backwards by swiping forward or backward on the touchscreen in Time Forecasting mode. 
Calql8 Time Zones does not require a data connection and works perfectly in Airplane mode.
The list of time zones can be filtered by City, Country, or time zone offset so you can quickly identify the time zone you want to see.

Features 
•12/24 hour mode
•show/hide seconds
•customizable the time zone name
•reorderable time zone list
•easily filtered time zone list to quickly find the city you are looking for
•Daylight savings indicator for each time zone currently being displayed
•Displays when Daylight savings time starts and ends for each time zone
•Animated startup screen
•Adjustable interval for time forecasting... 1 hour, 15 minutes, or 1 minute lets you adjust time to the minute with pinch-to-zoom gesture
•Go To Date dialog allows you to jump directly to a date to. This is especially useful when travelling around Daylight Savings Time changes in the future
•Works in Portrait or Landscape display
